Policymakers Are Back at Consensus 2024 https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2024/05/22/policymakers-are-back-at-consensus-2024/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines W3DFLCP4GVGQZKLJQJXJCIXEAA Nikhilesh DeThis week, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission might approve spot ether exchange-traded funds (ETFs), the House of Representatives may vote in favor of a crypto market structure bill, the company behind a decentralized exchange is arguing with the SEC, and that's all just in the U.S. All of these topics will come up at Consensus 2024 next week.
